A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm sad. I was hoping for this movie to be fun and thrilling like the VII but it wasn't.  The cinmetography\, plot\, and character development were all great\, but when it comes down to it\, star wars is supposed to be fun and this was not nearly as fun.  Granted the movie had some really cool moments\, but the movie as a whole\, especially the first half\, was a little boring.
